A list of available studies from the cBioPortal data repository

Source: R/data.R
studiesTable.Rd

A list of available studies from the cBioPortal data repository

studiesTable

Format

A data frame with 220 rows and 4 variables:

cancer_study_id

The study code used for input to `cBioDataPack`

study_name

A descriptive study title containing data center and year

description

A longer description of the study

URL

Associated study URLs

References

http://www.cbioportal.org/datasets, https://github.com/cBioPortal/cgdsr

Contents

Developed by Levi Waldron, Marcel Ramos.
